episodes.title: Syran Warner: Cults In America & The Journalist Taking Them Down
episodes.description: Syran Warner joins me on today’s show. He’s an independent journalist who previously worked for an alt-weekly in Minneapolis in several capacities over the course of 13 years. He now investigates cults in America and has begun exposing them, almost singlehandedly taking down The Body in Alaska and Profundity Yours in East Texas. Both have since relocated after Syran brought their practices to light. He has a fascinating story. We also get into Charles Manson, Jim Jones, and Scientology. Check it out! If you dig the podcast, please rate & follow along! Occult Folk Instagram: www.instagram.com/occultfolkpodcast Occult Folk YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@OccultFolk Find Syran: https://linktr.ee/syranwarner
